articles.title: First software defined geostationary satellite in orbit - eeNews Europe
articles.description: The Eutelsat Quantum is the world’s first software defined satellite in a geostationary orbit and uses technology from SSTL in the UK
articles.content:
The worlds first geostationary satellite, developed by Surrey Satellites in the UK,  has been launched into orbit by ArianeSpace for European operator Eutelsat.
The launch marks the culmination of 3… [+4354 chars]
